name: Space Drone
description:
Your goal is to grow your territory, kill your opponent and get the best score.

CONTROL : just click where you want to go.

Who wil have the best score ?

-----

This game is an abort professional project, the development was stop and I decide to release it for free here. It was originally plan to release on mobile, read more about the development story there : blog.flavienm.com.

Whatever the struggle to made this game, I enjoy to deliver it to the community, please leave me comment and who knows... maybe this game will reborn somewhere else :)

You can play the game there too : spacedrone.flavienm.com
